title: Should there be a Draft Mode Normal Queue (Unranked)?
body:
Just wanting to hear peoples opinions on the current champion selection type for Normal Mode (Unranked), "Blind Pick"; and would like to know your opinions of it. I would also like to know if anyone thinks that "Blind Pick" should be changed, perhaps to Draft Mode, or some variation of Draft Mode.

I'm eager to hear how the community feels on the matter.

Thank you for reading Summoners.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=Mc1nPqMw,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-01-08T00:37:19.107+0000)
>
> The testing process for the new champ select has gone faster than expected. That means that no regions will be doing an extended beta period like was originally planned. The good news is that means that champ select will be live on NA and TR for Ranked for a 72-hour testing cycle beginning on the 14th. If that goes well it will then be rolled one at a time to the other regions including OCE.
> 
> This means that the plan to have Normal Draft enabled for a short time to test the new champ select is no longer necessary. It is coming to Ranked soon and the plan is for it to replace Blind Pick sometime in the future.


[Source](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon?comment=00010001)

TL;DR: Riot OCE have said the new champion select is planned to replace Blind Pick Normals sometime in the future, soonâ„¢

Blind and Draft pick are getting deleted form OCE and being replaced with Dynamic queue.


Learn to read news updates.

Thanks for the reply mate.

That's great to hear, thanks for the quote too. Let's hope that Riot is swift with the replacement.

Either leave it as blind pick, or bring across the new champ select, but everyone can pick at the same time, and no champs are banned.
Sure there will be trolls, but it will deifnitely cut down on toxicity over people wanting a single role.
